description:
⚠️ As you’re aware, there have been high levels of cold and illness from the start of this year, and now also the added concern of the Coronavirus (Covid-19), and the risk of it spreading.

We're keeping a close eye on the government recommendation but at this time due to the low risk Bristol JS will continue to run, we'll post here if anything changes.

If you think you may have flu, please do not come. If you are able to come please frequently wash/sanitise your hands. We have ordered hand sanitisers which will be available at the event and will be requiring people to wash their hands before eating food.

--

Node-RED - Sam Machin

Talk description coming soon.
title: March 2020 - Node-RED & TBC
